00007 #include <map>                      // for member
00008 #include <DIS/msLibMacro.h>         // for library symbols

00010 namespace DIS
00011 {
00012    class Pdu;
00013 
00015    template<class BaseT, class DerivedT>
00016    BaseT* CreateImplementation()
00017    {
00018       return new DerivedT();
00019    }
00020 
00022    class EXPORT_MACRO PacketFactory
00023    {
00024    public:
00025 
00029       Pdu* CreatePacket(unsigned char id);
00030 
00033       void DestroyPacket(Pdu* pdu);
00034 
00038       template<class T>
00039       bool RegisterPacket(unsigned char id)
00040       {
00041          FunctionMap::value_type candidate(id,&CreateImplementation<Pdu,T>);
00042          std::pair<FunctionMap::iterator,bool> result = _fMap.insert( candidate );
00043          return result.second;
00044       }
00045 
00049       bool UnRegisterPacket(char id)
00050       {
00051          return( _fMap.erase( id )>0 );
00052       }
00053 
00057       bool IsRegistered(unsigned char id) const;
00058 
00059    private:
00061       typedef Pdu* (*CREATE_FUNC)();
00062 
00064       typedef std::map<unsigned char,CREATE_FUNC> FunctionMap;
00065 
00067       FunctionMap _fMap;
00068    };
00069 }
00070 
00071 #endif   // _dcl_dis_packet_factory_h_
